title: A Dracula to Remembula
itunes:title: A Dracula to Remembula
description:
This week, we did battle with the Overwatch 2 launch (and lost), got lost in the giant Grounded backyard, checked out the closed alpha of The Finals, said a preemptive goodbye to Stadia, stared in bafflement at anime Need for Speed, and took our very last opportunity to speculate about Chris Pratt's Mario voice.

Advertise on The Nextlander Podcast at Gumball.fm, or support us on Patreon!

CHAPTERS

(00:00:00) NOTE: Some timecodes may be inaccurate in versions other than the ad-free Patreon version due to dynamic ad insertions. Please use caution if skipping around to avoid spoilers.
(00:00:10) Intro
(00:01:57) Show rundown
(00:04:09) ALEX!
(00:04:38) Brisket cooking all day but you can't eat it...
(00:06:16) Finally cracked open my TV. Now I own it.
(00:14:12) The games
(00:14:24) Overwatch 2 [PC (Microsoft Windows), Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S] on Oct 04, 2022
(00:38:40) First Break
(00:38:45) Grounded [Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PC] on Sep 27, 2022
(00:49:17) The Finals [Closed Alpha]
(00:57:29) Moonbreaker [PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Sep 29, 2022
(01:02:16) Second Break
(01:02:20) News
(01:02:34) Stadia is shutting down and giving refunds
(01:19:06) Disco Elysium studio shakeups
(01:23:45) Halo franchise rumored to be changing to Unreal?
(01:32:27) Possible Horizon Zero Dawn remaster and multiplayer?
(01:38:32) CD Projeckt reveals new IP, Cyberpunk, and Witcher plans
(01:46:23) Is it time for an Anime Need for Speed?
(01:50:07) What's the deal with Mario? We need to know.
(02:00:50) Wrapping up and thanks
(02:02:21) Mysterious Benefactor Tier Shoutouts
(02:04:12) Coming up on Nextlander
(02:04:43) See ya!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
